column5: Tourist card must be obtained in advance via travel agency airline or at the embassy.
Tourist card must be purchased on arrival.
Electronic visa holders must arrive via
30 days eTV holders must arrive via 16 designated airports.
In addition to a visa an approval should be obtained from the Immigration department of the General Directorate for General Secutiy (La Surete Generale).
Visa on arrival for 30 days provided an invitation letter issued by the sponsor has been submitted
